subject: [Radiance-general] (u,v) coordinates on a mesh
body:
The established way seems to be to export to OBJ with UV texture
coordinates and use obj2mesh to convert it.

On Thu, Dec 8, 2011 at 6:51 PM, Randolph M. Fritz <RFritz at lbl.gov> wrote:
